issue.title: Mac App UI is freezed most of the time, with no active peers
issue.body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Current behaviour

App is not responding most of the time, mouse is spinning. It is totally unusable.
And also there is no stable active peers - there is almost no progress for 2 weeks.

![btc](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/assets/2361140/3ab5f708-808f-427b-bda9-8885a82969c8)


### Expected behaviour

1. App never freezes UI and is always responsive.
2. There are active working peers without the need of manually adding them.

### Steps to reproduce

Run the app while having 80.78% progress, on HDD.

### Relevant log output

If it contains personally identifying information then sorry.

### How did you obtain Bitcoin Core

Pre-built binaries

### What version of Bitcoin Core are you using?

v26.0.0

### Operating system and version

MacOS 13.6 (22G120)

### Machine specifications

Macbook Air M1
16Gb
External HDD 2Tb
